name: Buddy McLean
description: Stand Summon: **American Pie**. When I am played, choose 2 enemy cards on the field to silence. If there are less than 2 cards to silence, deal 5 damage to the enemy world instead
footer: Ceilings are weird, y'know? They only act to limit us, and stop us from taking flight, and seeing the stars.

stand.name: American Pie
stand.description: Every time an enemy card is silenced, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

name: Repugnans Fabula
description: Stand Summon: **Paradox**. When I am played, choose 2 enemy cards on the field to paradoxify. If it is already paradoxified, afflict it with a random paradox.
footer: I may not know who I am, but it won't stop me from doing what I have to.

stand.name: Paradox
stand.description: Round End: All enemy card's who have the paradoxified condition spread it to its neighbors.

name: Catastrophe
description: Whenever an ally is about to be damaged, it has a 50% chance of damaging a random enemy instead (Including itself).

name: Rook
description: Stand Summon: **Merrie Melodies**. The first time I am damaged, transform me into 'Ricky Rat'.

stand.name: Merrie Melodies
stand.description: When I am summoned, equip me with a random weapon, add a copoy of a random spell from the enemy's deck into your hand and reduce the cost of all created cards in your hand by 1.

generatedCharacters.name: Ricky Rat
generatedCharacters.description: Stand Summon: **Merrie Melodies**. When I am killed, create a 'Rook' in your hand.

stand.name: Merrie Melodies
stand.description: Whenever I am summoned, equip me with a random weapon and get a random spell from either the enemy's or your deck. All cards that you generate cost 1 less gold.

name: Tyler Wolfe
description: Stand: **See You Again**. When I am played, choose an enemy with equal or less attack than me to store inside a card. When I am defeated, release all stored enemies.
footer: I'm not gonna let my friends die, not anymore.

stand.name: See You Again
stand.description: Every round, the first spell or equipment the opponent plays is stored inside me.

name: Tommy
description: If all of the 5 Horsemen have been summoned, I gain +5/+5 and all cards on the field, in your hand, and in your deck gain +5/+5.
footer: Ahh! Please don't fire me! I have to provide for...

name: Robert E. O. Speedwagon
description: Stand Summon: **Die Young**. **Vampiric** When I am played, if your world is 50% HP or above, equip me with Wild Child. If the world is below 50% give me Kesha.
footer: The government shall pay... for my suffering!

stand.name: Die Young
stand.description: Whenever I am summoned, grant my user +1/+1 for each HP your world has lost this game. Grant me +1 health for each HP your world has lost this game.

equipment.name: Wild Child
equipment.description: When my wielder attacks, deal 1 damage to my world to deal 2 damage to the enemy getting attacked.

name: Garnet Speedwagon
description: If I survive for 5 turns, add 1 cost 'Dionte' in your hand.
footer: 'What is your name? Jolene? That is a pretty name. I had a daugther with that name!' - <Redacted> Months/Years ago

generatedCharacters.name: Dionte Brando
generatedCharacters.description: When I am summoned, Destroy the enemy deck.
generatedCharacters.footer: Time for the 50th reincarnation... Let's have some fun with it.

name: Nic
description: Stand Suit: **Brittle Bones Nic**. When I am summoned, equip me with 'Mop'.
footer: While cleaning may look easy, it would be naive to think that it is always a simple task..

stand.name: Brittle Bones Nic
stand.description: Turn 'Mop' into 'Bone Club'.

equipment.name: Bone Club
equipment.description: The enemy whom I attacked gets stunned for 1 turn.

name: Niko Goluskey
description: Stand Summon: **Rasputin**. When I am summoned, choose 1 enemy card on the field to silence. If there are no cards to silence on the field, silence a card in the enemy's hand.
footer: ... What do you need this time?

stand.name: Rasputin
stand.description: Whenever I am summoned, show 2 random cards in the enemy's hand.

name: Darnell Webber
description: When I am summoned, equip me with the 'Tree-90'. If there is an enemy card on the field who is silenced, give me +2/+2.
footer: Shit! I will be late to my honey again!

equipment.name: Tree-90
equipment.description: Whenever my wielder attacks, stun a random enemy on the field for 1 turn.

name: Ace Nullman
description: Stand Summon: **American Boy**. Deal 2 damage to the enemy world for every enemy card which was silenced or revealed this game. If the enemy world has more than 0 hp, equip omnipotence.
footer: 'The mission is to kill those guys who went after Xeion and Cometon. If you fail, consider yourself --' Cuts off communication. 'You don't tell me what to do... Pretender'

stand.name: American Boy
stand.description: At the end of your turn, deal 4 damage to all silenced enemies on the field

equipment.name: Omnipotence
equipment.description: Transform me into any equipment of your choice.

name: BB
description: Stand: **Fly Me to the Moon**. Game Start: Both players can have up to 8 cards on the field. When I am summoned, if your field has 7 other cards on it and if you have played 7 other cards this turn (making me the 8th!), give me infinite attack and health.
footer: 8. Such an interesting number. Wouldn't you say so... player?

stand.name: Fly Me to the Moon
stand.description: My user can move into any slot on the field at any point in time. (use the bb!bbMove command)

name: Danny
description: Stand Summon: **Locked out of Heaven**. **Liberation (5)**. Deal damage equal to my attack to all enemies.
footer: 'Woof!' - Danny said moments after feasting on a car engine.

stand.name: Locked out of Heaven
stand.description: Round End: Shuffle a Lock into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it deals 1 damage to all enemies.

generatedCharacters.name: Uptown Funk
generatedCharacters.description: Deal damage equal to my attack to all enemies. This repeats for the next 2 rounds. Round End: Shuffle a Lock into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it deals 1 damage to all enemies

name: Jolene Jones
description: Stand Summon: **The Scientist**.
footer: I will protect her from you. I will not fail her any more than I already have.

stand.name: The Scientist
stand.description: When I am summoned, make my user have 0 attack and 1 health for this turn. If they survive until the next turn, let them choose the perfect card to add to their hand.

name: Joy Jones
description: Stand Summon: **Eye of the Tiger**. If there is an enemy on the same position as me, grant that enemy -2 attack and -2 health.
footer: I must train harder. I must show her that I am strong enough to take care of myself!

stand.name: Eye of the Tiger
stand.description: If there is an enemy on the same position as me, grant me +2 attack and +2 health.

name: Ki Akihito
description: Stand Summon: **24-Hour Cinderella**. When I am summoned, equip me with the '宮本 武蔵(Miyamoto Musashi)'.
footer: Akihito! Get off your phone! .... Actually, never mind. I'll let Yui lecture you again :P

stand.name: 24-Hour Cinderella
stand.description: Round End: If you have 5 or less gold, generate a low cost spell. If you have 10 or less gold, generate a medium cost spell. If you have more than 10 gold, generate a high cost spell.

equipment.name: 宮本 武蔵(Miyamoto Musashi)
equipment.description: If my wielder is part of the verdant night give me +2 attack and +2 health.

name: Enrico Pucci
description: Stand Summon: **Made in Heaven**. When I am summoned, equip me with the 'نداء الجنة (Nida' Aljana)'.
footer: I am but a mere supporter of the spectacle that will be witnessed for the 50th time. Happy 50th anniversary... player.

stand.name: Made in Heaven
stand.description: Round end: Skip a number of turns equal to the amount of non skipped turns this card has been on the field.

equipment.name: نداء الجنة (Nida' Aljana)
equipment.description: If it is past turn 10, give me +4 attack and +4 health.

name: Mickey Bausse
description: Stand Summon: **Clubhouse**. When I am summoned, summon a 'Mouse Halal Guard' on the next 2 positions.
footer: I won't let your sacrifice go in vain... friend. I will take care of your family and community.

stand.name: Clubhouse
stand.description: Round End: Add a random Mouse Halal card to your hand.

name: Muhammed Hassan
description: Stand Summon: **Mirrors**.
footer: Please for the love of god shut up about my dad.

stand.name: Mirrors
stand.description: When I am summoned, deal damage to all enemies equal to their attack.

name: Dr. Wilson
description: Whenever I am damaged, deal 2 damage to the enemy with the lowest health. If there are no enemies, deal 3 damage to the enemy world
footer: Oh yes, that is the spot. OH YES! OH YES! OH YES! MAKE ME BLEED MORE!

name: Sabrina
description: Stand: **Devil Trigger**. I can attack any enemy on the enemy field. Every time I attack an enemy who is not on my position my attack action will not be used.
footer: PAXTON. YOU WILL PAYYYYYYYYYYYY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

stand.name: Devil Trigger
stand.description: Every time my user attacks and survives, give them +2 attack and +2 health.

name: Karolina Zeitmagier
description: Stand Summon: **Billie Jean**. When I am summoned, heal all allies and the allied World for all damage that was taken within the last 4 rounds. Round End: Heal all allies and the allied World for the damage taken last round.
footer: 'Billie Jean is not my lover. She's just a girl who claims that I am the one. But the kid is not my son' - Karolina sings happily while writing down some of her findings.

stand.name: Billie Jean
stand.description: Round Start and Summon: Summon a 'Zeit-Bombe' location on the enemy field.

generatedCards.name: Zeit-Bombe
generatedCards.description: Any enemy which is adjacent to me cannot attack this turn. Destroy me at the end of your turn.

name: Wilford Zeppeli
description: Stand: **Le Freak**. If there is an ally on the position before mine, feed them a random 2 cost 'Soul Dish'.
footer: HOW MARVELOUS!!! I hope you enjoy my next dish!!!

stand.name: Le Freak
stand.description: Round End: Add a 'Soul Dish' to your hand.

generatedCards.name: *Hey Baby!* Margherita Flatbread
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally on the field to give them +1 attack and +2 health.

generatedCards.name: *Yes I am* Greek Salad *with* Lettuce
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally on the field to give them +2 attack and +1 health.

generatedCards.name: *Kono* Greek Chicken Gyros with Tzatziki *Da!*
generatedCards.description: Feed me to 3 allies in your deck to give them +2 attack and +2 health.

generatedCards.name: *Oh? You're approaching this* Lasagna? *Instead of running away, you're coming right to this Lasagna?*
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally on the field to give them +3 attack

generatedCards.name: *I can't beat the shit out of this Penne Pasta without getting closer*
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally on the field to give them +3 health.

generatedCards.name: Calamari *OVERDRIVE!*
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally in hand to reduce their cost by 3.

generatedCards.name: Lesson 1: If you have the Tiramisu, then do it
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally in hand to give them +4 attack.

generatedCards.name: *Lesson 2: Work those* Galaktoboureko (custard in filo)
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally in hand to give them +4 health.

generatedCards.name: *Lesson 3: Believe in the* Kourabiedes (butter cookies)
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally in hand to give them +1 attack and +3 health.

generatedCards.name: *Lesson 4: Pay your respects. Spin your* Gelato *in the golden ratio.*
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally in hand to give them +3 attack and +1 health.

generatedCards.name: *Lesson 5: The shortest route is the* Halva (nut butter sweets). *It was the* Halva (nut butter sweets) *that was our shortest path*
generatedCards.description: Feed me to an ally in hand to give them +2 attack and +2 health.

name: Grey Nullifer
description: Stand Summon: **Gangsta's Paradise**. Equalize my opponent's stats making them equal each other by reducing the higher stat by the difference.
footer: And when there is null, there is me... all alone.

stand.name: Gangsta's Paradise
stand.description: Summon and Round End: Nullify **ALL STANDS** on both fields

name: Essence of Delusion
description: Spend all of your gold to play me. When I am summoned, I gain 1 attack and 1 health for each gold spent. Shuffle a copy of me into your deck.
footer: WE'VE DONE IT! WE HAVE SUCCESSFULLY MADE A VIAL OF D10! Wait... why is it moving...

name: Jameson J. Jonah
description: Stand: **Paparazzi**. **Liberation (10)**. When I am played, summon two 0 / 1 children.
footer: The younger... the better :)

stand.name: Paparazzi
stand.description: When I am summoned, for every position taken on the allied field, reveal a card in the enemy hand.

generatedCharacters.name: Death By Glamour
generatedCharacters.description: When I am summoned, for every position taken on the allied field, reveal a card in the enemy hand and give all allies +1 attack and +1 health (max amount is +7 attack and +7 health).

name: Pretender
description: When I am summoned, transform me into another card of the same cost from your hand or deck. I gain its effects as well. When I am attacked, I explode, dealing 5 damage to the attacker and 1 damage to all other enemies.
footer: I am not who I seem to be. I am not who you think I am. I am not who you want me to be. I am not who you need me to be. But most importantly, I am not who I was.

name: Contradictory Soldier
description: When I strike an enemy, give them the paradox condition. If it is already paradoxified, afflict it with a random paradox.
footer: I am but a mere paradox... Kill me...

name: Kelly Shanks
description: Stand Equip: **GAS GAS GAS**. When I am played, deal 1 damage to the enemy world.
footer: PEDAL TO THE METAL BABY!!!

stand.name: GAS GAS GAS
stand.description: I go into Sword Mode when enemy world is higher than 10 HP and Bike Mode when enemy world is less than or equal to 10 HP

mode.name: GAS GAS GAS (Bike Mode)
mode.description: When I am in this mode, whenever my wielder attacks, they attack all enemies and the enemy world.

mode.name: GAS GAS GAS (Sword Mode)
mode.description: When I am in this mode, whenever my wielder attacks, they deal 2 damage to the enemy world.

name: Pyotr Parker
description: When I die, draw a stand user.
footer: I hope you guys enjoyed the tour for today!

name: Arthur Pendragon
description: Stand Equip: **Excalibur**. When I am played, kill an enemy.
footer: My judgement shall no longer be clouded! I shall be the one who brings justice to this cruel world!

stand.name: Excalibur
stand.description: Every time an enemy dies, I gain +2 attack.

name: Hilde Pendragon
description: Stand Summon: **Edge of Dawn**.
footer: I will not let you take my father away from me!

stand.name: Edge of Dawn
stand.description: No allies can die or take damage while I am in play.

name: Shane Crawford
description: Stand: **The Final Countdown**. When I am played, give me -1 attack for every enemy in play.
footer: Darnell, I can't shoot this. Please... Take it.

stand.name: The Final Countdown
stand.description: Round End: All permanent stat buffs / debuffs that have occurred this round go away.

name: Ben Torch
description: Stand Equip: **Fireflies**. When I am summoned, give me +1 attack and +1 health for every 'Children of Liberty' card in the allied field.
footer: Monoceros Lumineers, we will rescue those children and figure out the secrets to this building okay? I know we are a new team but I have faith in us!

stand.name: Fireflies
stand.description: Whenever my wielder attacks, if the enemy target has more attack than my wielder has health, give me +2 health. If the enemy target has less attack than my wielder has health, give me +2 attack.

name: Chris Woles
description: When I am summoned, shuffle a 'Pretender' into your deck and give me +1 attack for every enemy on the field.
footer: Your mission is to assassinate the stand users on that subway. Succeed and your mother and sister shall be set for life okay?

generatedCharacters.name: Pretender
generatedCharacters.description: When I am summoned, transform me into another card of the same cost from your hand or deck. I gain its effects as well. When I am attacked, I explode, dealing 5 damage to the attacker and 1 damage to all other enemies.
generatedCharacters.footer: I am not who I seem to be. I am not who you think I am. I am not who you want me to be. I am not who you need me to be. But most importantly, I am not who I was.

name: Sergey Stepanov
description: Stand Summon: **Owner of a Lonely Heart**.
footer: Now you... seem like a powerful opponent.

stand.name: Owner of a Lonely Heart
stand.description: Before I attack an enemy, I steal 1 attack and 1 health from them. (These stat bonuses go to my user as well)

name: Dionte Brando
description: When I am summoned, Destroy the enemy deck.
footer: Time for the 50th reincarnation... Let's have some fun with it.

name: Cometon
description: Stand Summon: **Believing and Being**. When I am summoned, give me +1 attack and +1 health for every 'Eye of the Peacock' card in the allied field.
footer: This younger girl came to us after that taliban attack. She is quite pretty ain't she? Lets have some... fun with her.

stand.name: Believing and Being
stand.description: When there are 3 or more enemies on the enemy field, give me +3 attack. When there are less than 3 enemies on the enemy field, give me +3 health. When there are less than 2 allies on the allied field, give me +3 attack. When there are 2 or more allies on the allied field, give me +3 health.

name: Xeion
description: Stand Suit: **Never gonna give you up**. When I am summoned, give me +1 attack and +1 health for every 'Eye of the Peacock' card in the allied field.
footer: This one came in with the other young girl. She is quite... deformed ain't she? Let's reshape her shall we?

stand.name: Never gonna give you up
stand.description: When an ally on the field is about to get an attack that would be lethal to them, I will move to their position and will take it instead.

name: Silver Bucciarati
description: Stand Summon: **The Phoenix**. When I am summoned, give me +1 attack and +1 health for every ally on the field.
footer: That man made me sick... imagine abusing children for fun... 'You know we are part of the reason he is like that right?'

stand.name: The Phoenix
stand.description: Round Start: Heal me and all adjacent allies by 3.

name: FBI Soldier
description: When I am summoned, give me +1 attack for every 'Federation of Bizarre Intelligence' card in the allied field.
footer: Abnormalities detected. Perimeter secured. Proceed into the house.

name: Minnie Bausse
description: When I am summoned, add a random spell and character card to your hand
footer: I'm simply ear-esistible!

name: Boofy
description: When I am summoned, add a random equipment and location card to your hand
footer: Ya gotta talk to everybody! I bet you'll hear some pretty interestin' stuff. Course, you can always keep on talkin' to me, too!

name: Donald Buck
description: When I am summoned, destroy an enemy location
footer: It must be a Heartless! Let's see how it handles my magic! THUNDER! Huh? That's odd. THUNDER! THUNDER! Umm... FIRE! Blizzard? I don't get it. Why isn't my magic working?

name: Bete
description: When I am summoned, destroy an enemy equipment
footer: Alright you Grim Grinning Ghosties get out there and haunt this house!

name: Bhip
description: When I am summoned, add a 1 cost 'Bale' card to your hand.
footer: Bale Forgets His Own Phone Number. How Is He Gonna Break A Code?

generatedCharacters.name: Bale
generatedCharacters.description: When I am summoned, add a 1 cost 'Bhip' card to your hand.

name: Mortimer Bausse
description: When I am summoned, give me +1 attack and +1 health for every card you have generated this game.
footer: Mind if I barrow your girl?

name: Daisy Buck
description: Deal damage equal to the amount of generated cards you have played this game to an enemy character or the enemy world.
footer: Do you have a second? Fashion isn't just about clothing, you know. You also have to know how to accessorize. I've been putting together a nice collection of accessories myself... but now I've run out of room to store them all. My place is positively full to bursting! Even the nicest home can be ruined by too much clutter--no matter how fashionable. If only I had a nifty shelf to hold my accessories...

name: Paradoxed Survivor
description: When I am summoned, paradoxify an enemy character. If it is already paradoxified, afflict it with a random paradox. Whenever an enemy gets afflicted with a random paradox, give me +1 attack and +1 health.
footer: I'm not sure what's going on, but I'm pretty sure I'm not supposed to be here.

name: FBI Pediatrician (Children's Doctor)
description: When I am summoned, heal an ally character and the allied world for 2 health
footer: 'It is okay X137. I promise I will not hurt you. I am here to help you.' *scoffs* (unlike those monsters)

name: Dr. Rose
description: Heal the allied world by 2 for every ally character you have on the field.
footer: I have to get out of here...

name: Child of Liberty
description: When I am summoned, draw a card
footer: On it Olympic Torch! Operation B.R.E.A.K.E.R Underway!
